name: Herobrine Hunting!
description: So basically this is a Minecraft-inspired game I made on Microsoft Makecode Arcade a while ago and I wanted to publish it so I just basically decided to put it over here so basically the point of the game is to hit the Herobrines and make sure not to hit any Creepers. Also if you're wondering how it's colorblind friendly is because the silhouettes of all characters are different (the Herobrines have fire in their hand, the Creepers have no arms, and the Player has a sword). Also I will be keeping this free 4 ever.
